BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Dr. Simona Kwon to the Council for its advice and consent prior to her appointment to the Board of Health, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 553 of the City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Dr. Simona Kwon, Board of Health

Items.Title: Communication from the New York County Democratic Committee recommending the name of Jenny Low to the Council regarding her appointment to the office of Commissioner of Elections of the Board of Elections pursuant to § 3-204 of the New York State Election Law.
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NY County Democratic Committee recommending the name of Jenny Low to the Council regarding her appointment to the office of Commissioner of Elections of the Board of Elections.

Items.MatterName: Julio Medina, New York City Board of Correction

Items.Title: Patricia Marthone, MUDr, a resident of Brooklyn, Council candidate for designation and subsequent appointment by the Mayor to the New York City Health + Hospitals Board of Directors pursuant to the By-Laws of the NYC Health + Hospitals.
